Sentencas: Reversible solid-oxide cells (SOCs) are a promising technology for mitigating the fluctuation of power from renewable sources.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: Mode switching between electrolysis and fuel cells occurs frequently and is necessary for an SOC stack.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: Herein, a dynamic SOC-stack model was developed and validated against experimental data.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: Subsequently, we extensively studied the stack temperature (T-s), voltage (V-s), and reversible efficiency (eta(re)) with different designing and operating parameters, including stack heat capacity (C-s), inlet hydrogen fraction (chi(H2)), stack operational pressure (p), inlet work medium temperature (T-in), current density (I), and mode switching frequency (f).
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: For an actual SOC plant, the stack may work in a nearly adiabatic environment.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: Our calculation results show that with increasing from 0.2 to 0.6, the variation in Delta T-s decreases by 25%, V-s increases by 10%, and eta(re) increases by 2.9%.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: With fourfold increasing in C-S and p, Delta T-s decreases by 75% and 25% and eta(re) increases by 0.47% and 1.8%, respectively, whereas, V-s is nearly unaffected.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: Delta T-s and Delta V-s almost proportionally increase with I. In relation to T-in or f, Delta T-s is unaffected, Delta V-s decreases, and eta(re) slightly increases.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: Overall, this work identified the most critical stack designing and operating factors affecting the transient behavior of an SOC stack during mode switching processes.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes

Sentencas: The results can serve as guidelines for SOC-stack design and operation-strategy optimization.
Titulo: Dynamic modeling and parameter analysis study on reversible solid oxide cells during mode switching transient processes
